name: Golden Troupe's Reward
description:
End Phase: If the character to which this is attached is on standby, this card gains 1 "Recompense" point. (Max 2 points)
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill: For each "Recompense" point this card has, consume it to spend 1 less Elemental Die.
